resources.string: This beta has expired, please update the app.
Automatic discovery is not supported on BlackBerry devices, please enter values manually with "Custom Device".
"Log in to tivo.com, then open the 'View media access key' section to find this value.\n\nOr, on your TiVo, navigate to Settings > Account & System Info > Media Access Key."
"Log in to tivo.com, then open the 'DVR preferences' section to find this value; it should be like 'tsn:###' with 15 digits and no hyphens."
"Please provide your TiVo's Media Access Key."
Could not connect. Are you on the right WiFi network?
Could not do discovery; falling back to manual settings.
Could not access wifi, is it enabled?
Device search failed. Add a custom device.
You need to enable network control and/or video sharing to connect to this TiVo. Check the help screen.
This app designed only to work with a TiVo branded device, of the Premiere, Roamio, Bolt, or newer model line.\n\nThe selected device is incompatible.
This app designed only to work with a TiVo branded device, of the Premiere, Roamio, Bolt, or newer line.\n\nThe selected device is unknown, and is very likely incompatible.
WARNING: device compatibility checks skipped. This device may not function correctly.
Unexpected condition, please send an error report, with the button at the bottom of the help screen.
